content: Potresti parlare più piano per favore? Ho il mal di testa da sbornia.
translations: eng:Could you please speak more quietly﹖ I am feeling hungover
eng:Could you please speak more quietly﹖ I am hungover
eng:Could you please speak more quietly﹖ I feel hungover
eng:Could you please speak more quietly﹖ I'm hungover
